game_description: Fantasynth 2 is an ongoing exploration of the emotional and perceptual effects of procedurally generated visuals synchronized to music. This installment of the series focuses on building a walkable virtual space anchored in reality but evolving with the music, intersecting with the real space like a parallel new sensory dimension. Featuring music by Carbon Based Lifeforms. Duration: 5 minutes.
review_1: Don't forget to redraw your guardian to make the most of it!
